page.title: 17Employment
page.content: EMPLOYMENT IN DELABOLE. "Kelland's" by Patrick Curran. Kelland's sell construction machinery to County councils, quarries and the construction industry. They are agents for Massey-Ferguson diggers, Hanomag swing shovels, Haulomatic dumptrucks and Perkins engines. Jellands also do after-sales service on those machines. My dad is a service engineer at Kelland's. He services and repairs the machines that they sell, as well as other plant. His duties include welding, fabrication and repair of the machinery. He does a lot of travelling in his job, working on site repairing machines which have broken down, driving to and from Bridgwater when very heavy spares have to be transported to Delabole,
